event.title: ServiceNow Training By Industry Experts
event.description:
Service Now is an American cloud computing company that supports IT Service Management (ITSM). It helps you to automate IT Business Management (ITBM). This cloud-based platform is designed based on ITIL guidelines.
In this course, you will gain knowledge on how to design applications using advanced features of ServiceNow such as scripting, reporting, integrations, etc. Enroll Now!

Course Features:

30 Days of Instructor-Led ServiceNow Training
Real World use cases and Scenarios
Practical Approach
Expert & Certified Trainers

About KBS:

KBS is one of the leading Online training providers with a decade of experience in the Online IT training Industry. We trained thousands of students and even handled hundreds of corporates clients across the world.
KBS offers the best training in the industry with industry expert trainers. Some of our on-demand courses such as ServiceNow, Business Intelligence, RPA, Blockchain, and Cyber Security.

Key Features:
Flexible Timings
Certified & Industry Experts Trainers
Multiple Training Delivery Models
Customize Course
24/7 Support
Hands-On Experience
Real-Time Use Cases
Q&A with Trainers
Job Support
Placement Assistance.
